query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `gamification_notifications` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `studentId` int NOT NULL,
  `type` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `message` text NOT NULL,
  `isRead` tinyint(1) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4EmYiUJsZhACerp.0e9436e27250 --database c6FhCpifoFzEQqXNtsKEU6 --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `gamification_notifications` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `studentId` int NOT NULL,
  `type` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `message` text NOT NULL,
  `isRead` tinyint(1) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
